string-array.name: spinnerItems
string-array.item: All products and their warranty expiry dates
Product\'s warranty expiry date in 1 month time
Product\'s warranty expiry date in 3 months time
Product\'s warranty expiry date in 6 months time

string-array.name: spinnerOption
string-array.item: Add a product and its warranty expiry date
Update a product and its warranty expiry date

resources.string: Easy to maintain your list of products and their warranty expiry dates.

1. Add a new product and its warranty expiry date
 2. Update existing product and its warranty expiry date
3. Delete an existing product from the list
4. Search for specific products based on warranty expiry date
*Press and hold on the product in the list to delete
Enter updated product\'s warranty expiry date
